items.title: iOS 11 & Objective-C - Complete Developer Course
items.headline: A Complete iOS 11 and Xcode 9 Course with Objective-C
objectives_summary: Full understanding of Xcode 9 and all it has to offer
Learn how to program for IOS 11 to create your own apps
Create fully featured games

items.title: Alexa Essential Training  (updated Feb 2019)
items.headline: Use Alexa CLI & SDK v2 to build several complete Alexa games & business skills from scratch. (No Device needed)
objectives_summary: Develop Alexa skills using Alexa Skills Kit (ASK) and publish skills to Alexa Skill Store
Create Skills using Account linking feature of Alexa Skills Kit, so that you can link Alexa user with use in your system
Learn how to access external APIs from your Alexa Skills

items.title: Android Beginners Guide To Create A Weather Forecast App
items.headline: Learn Android by creating a weather forecast app from OpenWeatherMap API using Volley Library
objectives_summary: Build a complete weather forecast Android app
Have a better understanding of creating an app from scratch

items.title: Ionic Apps for WooCommerce: Build an eCommerce Mobile App
items.headline: Learn Ionic Framework and start building your own eCommerce app for Android and iOS using HTML, CSS and AngularJS.
objectives_summary: Create amazing mobile apps using Ionic
Create apps that work on both Android and iOS
Build eCommerce Apps

items.title: Beast Android Development: Advanced Android UI
items.headline: Master Android Design, Google APIs, and Different Android Libraries. Learn to implement Firebase as your apps back-end.
objectives_summary: Build advanced reycler-views
Understand a variety of android libraries such as ottobus and butter-knife
Implement popular Google APIs

items.title: Complete iOS 10 development Bootcamp
items.headline: A complete app design process and development with swift 3, xcode 8, SketchApp and Firebase for ios 10
objectives_summary: FIRST - Course was recorded after the official release of Xcode 8 - No Beta Bugs
By the end you will have full knowledge about using components like camera and Microphone in App
By the end you will have applicable knowledge of swift 3

items.title: Develop Full iOS Facebook Clone App in Swift, Xcode and PHP
items.headline: Best Swift Course Ever | Build Complete Facebook Clone | All Features & Functionalities | Build Custom Backend Server
objectives_summary: Learn to create the entire Facebook from scratch.
Easily program in Swift.
Easily program in PHP.
